abstract: Creates an asynchronous iterator for the collection.
overview:
## Return Value

An asynchronous iterator.

## Discussion

This method creates an asynchronous iterator for the collection. Typically, you won’t call this method. Instead, use a `try`-`await`-`in` loop inside of an `async` task, which creates an iterator implicitly and waits for the session to publish new [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PhotogrammetrySession/Output] objects, as the following example demonstrates.

items.description: The type of element used for Photogrammetry Session updates.
items.name: PhotogrammetrySession.Outputs.Element

items.description: An object for iterating over published output objects.
items.name: PhotogrammetrySession.Outputs.Iterator

title: makeAsyncIterator()
